Title: State Fair
Cast: Janet Gaynor, Will Rogers, Lew Ayres, Sally Eilers, Norman Foster, Louise Dresser, Frank Craven, Victor Jory, Frank Melton
Plot: An Iowa family finds adventure, love, and heartbreak, when they spend a week at the state fair. The Frake family attend the Iowa State Fair. Father Abel enters his Hampshire boar, Blue Boy, in the hog contents. Mother Melissa enters the mincemeat competition. And their children, Margy and Wayne, find love with newspaper reporter Pat Gilbert and trapeze artist Emily Joyce. But will everyone return home safe and happy or will hearts be broken? Written by L. Hamre
Actors: Janet Gaynor, Will Rogers, Lew Ayres
Writer: Philip Stong (novel), Sonya Levien (screenplay) | 1 more credit »
Description: Directed by Henry King.  With Janet Gaynor, Will Rogers, Lew Ayres, Sally Eilers. An Iowa family finds adventure, love, and heartbreak, when they spend a week at the state fair.
